@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@
+import { defineConfig } from 'vitest/config';
+
+export default defineConfig({
+  test: {
+    globals: true,
+    environment: 'node',
+    include: ['src/**/*.{test,spec}.ts'],
+    exclude: ['node_modules', 'dist', 'build'],
+    reporters: ['verbose'],
+  },
+});

@@ -5,7 +5,8 @@
     globals: true,
     environment: 'node',
     include: ['src/**/*.{test,spec}.ts'],
     exclude: ['node_modules', 'dist', 'build'],
+    passWithNoTests: true,
     reporters: ['verbose'],
   },
 });
